TopicTitle: Bug report - Mouseover highlights at KSC

Articles.Content:
The tracking station and R&D buildings do not fully/correctly highlight on mouseover. This has been the case for a while now, but it's still not been fixed, so I'm guessing it's one of those things that everyone notices but no one remembers to make a formal bug report for. Please consider this that report.

Thank you.

**[MOD - Moved to Bug Report subforums]**

Could you please ensure that your bug report is compliant with the following guide?
